title: Topic Classifier
description: Assign predefined topics and subtopics to data records (row) using AI classification.

dataset.title: Dataset
dataset.description: Dataset containing the data records to process. Either an Apify dataset ID or a URL to a parquet file.

model.title: LLM Model
model.description: The LLM provider and model to use for topic extraction. Format: provider/model (e.g., 'openai/gpt-4', 'anthropic/claude-3-sonnet')

attrs.title: Record Attributes
attrs.description: List of record attributes/columns to use for topic extraction. If null, all attributes are used. This allows focusing on specific fields in your data.

topics.title: Topic Hierarchy
topics.description:
A JSON object defining the topic hierarchy for classification. Each key represents a main topic, and the corresponding value is an array of subtopics.

Example format:
{
  "Technology": ["AI/ML", "Web Development", "Mobile Apps"],
  "Marketing": ["SEO", "Social Media", "Content Marketing"]
}

The classifier will assign one topic and subtopic to each keyword based on its SERP content.
